g.title: echo_issue_dependencies
g.text: Edge direction: prerequisite → dependent (do tail before head)
Edge styles encode confidence (solid=strong, dashed=medium, dotted=weak).
Green = Confirmed in Issue Body; Red = In Issue Body but missing from Plan.

g.title: cluster_W1___Wesley_as_a_Boundary_Grammar
